verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your heart and Your light
That's what You called us to be
Lord help us become truly one in unity
Lord help us to pay the price
To respond to Your grace
To lay down our lives for You
And one another each day

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And we say yes Lord! Yes Lord!
Yes to Your call, Yes to our common life
And we say yes Lord! Yes Lord!
Yes to Your call to renew Your church
As we more fully become
Your heart and Your light

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord use us to heal and teach us to pray
Make us a living example
Of how to walk in Your way
